## DeepProp type

Get a union of all properties on TObject, including properties of nested objects. Format 'prop1 \| prop2 \| prop2.sub1'

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type DeepProp<TObject> = ValueOf<{
    [P in Prop<TObject>]: TObject[P] extends object ? (P | `${P}.${DeepProp<TObject[P]>}`) : P;
}>;
```
<b>References:</b> [ValueOf](./global-types.valueof.md)<!-- -->, [Prop](./global-types.prop.md)<!-- -->, [DeepProp](./global-types.deepprop.md)
